author: craigmcc
msg: When automatically setting the user session Locale if it is not already
present, use the value returned from the servlet container (via the
ServletRequest.getLocale() method) if there is one, before calculating
our own.

author: craigmcc
msg: Treat a zero-length pathInfo value the same as a null one when doing
path mapping.  This works around problems in the web connectors for Tomcat
(as well as possibly other servers) that return "" instead of null for the
value of request.getPathInfo().
Submitted by: Christophe Thiebaud <cthiebaud@stylo.it>

author: craigmcc
msg: Create a manifest in struts.jar that identifies our extension package.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update release notes for new feature.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a log() method to ActionServlet that also takes a debugging detail level.
If you have set the "debug" initialization parameter to a value greater than
or equal to the specified level, this message will be logged -- otherwise it
will be ignored.
NOTE:  While this method is convenient, it is generally more efficient to do
the conditional test in your action, prior to calling this log() method which
often includes string concatenations to construct the message string.
Submitted by: Roberg Leleand <Robert@freetocreate.org>
